data.prayer: Father, help your children in Rajkot, Gujarat, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rajkot, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Rajkot words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Rajkot, Gujarat, India. Please, stir the 41,851 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, let the threatened of Rajkot, Gujarat, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Patni Jamat people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Patni Jamat people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Patni Jamat people is yours.
Spirit, fill the 41,851 believers in the county of Rajkot with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 41,851 believers in Rajkot, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Rajkot, Gujarat, India has a population of 3,804,600.

We estimate Rajkot has 41,851 people who might know Jesus, 46,162 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,716,587 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 41,851 believers in the county of Rajkot to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Rajkot
location.people_groups_list: Lohana, Siddi (Muslim traditions), Gavri, Yadav Golarana, Kharva (Muslim traditions)
